reviewText: The yoga covers a good area. It would be a lot more calming if it had soothing, relaxing music playing in the background. Also, it would be more helpful if each of the sections said how long they take. I have no idea how much time each section of the yoga dvd will take to do which I need to know in order to know how much time and energy I have available to do that individual section.

This is an excellent DVD. It ranges from easy gentle poses to more strenuous ones, so you can
pick which ones you want to do. It really does help with fatigue!

This DVD is very helpful in coping with my post viral fatigue syndrome. It is very relaxing and decreases my stress level to help me cope. I especially enjoy the deep breathing...it releases tension for me. I highly recommend it!! :)
